question: 勧める
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>recommend</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to recommend</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: To remember the reading think about how you are going <vocabulary>to recommend</vocabulary> this restaurant to your friends, <reading>Sue</reading> and <reading>Sue</reading> (<ja>すす</ja>). You refer to them as "Sue Sue" to make things easier on yourself, and they're always looking for recommendations.
